home.title: Shortn - URL Shortener, QR Codes & Link Management | Free URL Shortening Tool
home.description: Shorten URLs, create custom QR codes, and manage links with powerful analytics. Free URL shortener with branded links, bio pages, campaign tracking, and detailed click analytics.
home.keywords: url shortener, link shortener, short url, custom url, qr code generator, link management, analytics, bio link, link in bio, utm tracking, campaign management, branded links, free url shortener, shorten link

about.title: About Shortn - Modern Link Management Platform
about.description: Learn about Shortn, the comprehensive link management platform that helps businesses and creators optimize their online presence with URL shortening, QR codes, and analytics.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans - Shortn URL Shortener | Free & Premium Options
pricing.description: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. Start free with basic URL shortening, or upgrade to Pro for unlimited links, custom domains, advanced analytics, and priority support.

products.title: Features - URL Shortener, QR Codes & Analytics | Shortn

testimonials.1: Using Shortn's URL shortener has transformed our marketing efforts. The ability to create branded, trackable links has not only boosted our click-through rates but also provided invaluable insights into our audience's behavior. It's an essential tool for any business looking to enhance their online presence.
testimonials.2: Shortn's URL shortening service is a game-changer for our social media campaigns. The ease of creating custom short links that reflect our brand has significantly increased engagement and shareability. Plus, the detailed analytics allow us to fine-tune our strategies based on real data. We can't imagine running our campaigns without it!
testimonials.3: As a University teacher, I've found Shortn's URL shortener to be an invaluable tool for sharing resources with my students. The custom links are easy to remember and share, making it simple for students to access course materials and stay organized. The analytics feature also helps me understand which resources are most utilized, allowing me to tailor my teaching approach effectively. The password protection feature ensures that only my students can access the links, maintaining the integrity of the course content.

cta.title: Start creating short links today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses and individuals using Shortn for better link management.

hero.title: Dynamic QR Codes that track
hero.subtitle: Create customizable QR codes with built-in analytics. Update destinations anytime without reprinting, and track every scan in real-time.

customizable-design.title: Customizable design
customizable-design.description: Add your logo, customize colors, and match your brand identity perfectly.

dynamic-updates.title: Dynamic Updates
dynamic-updates.description: Change the destination URL anytime without creating a new QR code.

detailed-analytics.title: Detailed Analytics
detailed-analytics.description: Track every scan with detailed analytics including location and device data.

testimonials.1: Shortn's QR code generator has transformed how we engage with our customers. The ability to create dynamic QR codes that we can update on the fly has been a game-changer for our marketing campaigns. Plus, the detailed analytics give us invaluable insights into customer behavior, allowing us to tailor our strategies effectively. Highly recommended!
testimonials.2: As a small business owner, Shortn's QR code generator has been an essential tool for connecting with my customers. The customization options allowed me to brand my QR codes, making them more appealing an helping me establish a professional image.
testimonials.3: Using Shortn's QR code generator has significantly enhanced our event marketing efforts. The ease of creating and managing dynamic QR codes has allowed us to provide attendees with up-to-date information and exclusive content. The analytics feature has also been invaluable in measuring engagement and planning future events more effectively.

cta.title: Start creating QR codes today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses and individuals using Shortn to create dynamic QR codes.

hero.title: Understand your audience with in-depth analytics
hero.subtitle: Get detailed insights into every click. Track locations, devices, referrers, and more with real-time analytics that help you make better decisions.

geographic-data.title: Geographic Data
geographic-data.description: See where your clicks are coming from with detailed location data.

device-analytics.title: Device Analytics
device-analytics.description: Track clicks by device type, browser, and operating system.

referrer-tracking.title: Referrer Tracking
referrer-tracking.description: Understand which platforms and websites drive the most traffic.

testimonials.1: Shortn's analytics dashboard has been a game-changer for my marketing strategy. The detailed insights into link performance have allowed me to optimize my campaigns effectively. I can see exactly where my traffic is coming from and which links are performing best. Highly recommended!
testimonials.2: As a digital marketer, Shortn's analytics tools have provided me with invaluable data. The ability to track clicks, geographic locations, and referrers has helped me tailor my content to better suit my audience. The real-time analytics feature is particularly useful for monitoring campaign performance on the fly.
testimonials.3: Using Shortn's analytics has significantly improved our understanding of our audience. The comprehensive data on link performance has enabled us to make informed decisions and refine our marketing strategies. The user-friendly interface makes it easy to navigate and extract the insights we need.

cta.title: Start tracking your engagement today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses and individuals using Shortn to gain valuable insights.

hero.title: One link for all your content
hero.subtitle: Create a beautiful landing page for your Instagram, TikTok, and social media bio. Share all your important links in one place with custom branding.

full-customization.title: Full Customization
full-customization.description: Choose themes, colors, fonts, and layouts that match your personal brand.

social-integration.title: Social Integration
social-integration.description: Display your social media icons and connect all your profiles in one place.

detailed-analytics.title: Detailed Analytics
detailed-analytics.description: Group your links and track clicks to see which content resonates most with your audience.

testimonials.1: Shortn's Pages feature has revolutionized how I share my content online. As a content creator, having a single, customizable landing page for all my links has made it incredibly easy for my audience to find and engage with my work. The analytics provided help me understand my audience better and tailor my content accordingly.
testimonials.2: As a small business owner, Shortn's Pages feature has been a game-changer for my online presence. It allows me to create a professional-looking landing page that showcases all my products and services in one place. The customization options let me align the page with my brand identity, and the analytics help me track visitor engagement effectively.
testimonials.3: Using Shortn's Pages feature has significantly enhanced my social media marketing efforts. The ability to create a single landing page with all my important links has made it easier for my followers to keep up with my latest content.

cta.title: Start creating Pages today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses and individuals using Shortn to create dynamic Pages.

about.we-believe-powerful-tools-shouldnt-come-: We believe powerful tools shouldn't come with enterprise price tags. That's why we built shortn.at.
about.we-started-shortn-at-because-we-were-fru: We started shortn.at because we were frustrated with the high costs of existing link management platforms. Small businesses, creators, and startups were paying hundreds of dollars per month for basic features.
about.we-knew-there-was-a-better-way-by-buildi: We knew there was a better way. By building efficient infrastructure and focusing on what matters, we created a platform that offers enterprise features at 85% lower prices without compromising on quality or reliability.
about.global-cdn-ensures-lightning-fast-redire: Global CDN ensures lightning-fast redirects worldwide
about.built-with-feedback-from-hundreds-of-use: Built with feedback from hundreds of users
about.were-passionate-about-creating-tools-tha: We're passionate about creating tools that empower individuals and businesses to succeed online. Your support means the world to us.
about.building-the-future-of-link-management-o: Building the future of link management, one feature at a time.
about.accelerating-development-with-intelligen: Accelerating development with intelligent code suggestions and completions.
about.helping-architect-solutions-and-solve-co: Helping architect solutions and solve complex problems with thoughtful analysis.

validation.backhalf-max: Back-half can't be longer than 52 characters
validation.backhalf-format: Back-half can only contain letters, numbers, dashes (-), and underscores (_)
validation.password-min: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.password-max: Password can't be longer than 100 characters
validation.hint-max: Hint can't be longer than 100 characters

upgrade-button.title: Upgrade Plan
upgrade-button.description: You're about to upgrade to the {plan} plan. You'll be invoiced for the prorated difference based on your remaining billing period, and your new features will be available immediately.
upgrade-button.error-default: Failed to update subscription. Please try again.
upgrade-button.error-unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support.
upgrade-button.note: Charges appear on your next statement

cancel-button.title: Cancel Subscription
cancel-button.description: We're sorry to see you go. Your subscription will be set to cancel at the end of your current billing period, and you'll continue to have access to all features until then.
cancel-button.feedback-placeholder: Help us improve by sharing more details...
cancel-button.error-select-reason: Please select a reason for cancellation
cancel-button.error-default: Failed to schedule cancellation. Please try again.
cancel-button.error-unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support.
cancel-button.note: Cancellation takes effect at the end of your billing period

revert-button.description: You have a scheduled {changeType} set for {date}. Would you like to revert this change and keep your current plan?
revert-button.error-default: Failed to revert change. Please try again.
revert-button.error-unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support.
revert-button.note: This will restore your subscription to its current active state.

utm-defaults-editor.title: Campaign Settings
utm-defaults-editor.description: Configure default UTM parameters that auto-populate when adding links
utm-defaults-editor.description-placeholder: Add a description for this campaign...
utm-defaults-editor.description-help: A brief description to help identify this campaign's purpose
utm-defaults-editor.sources-help: e.g., facebook, twitter, newsletter - identifies where traffic comes from
utm-defaults-editor.mediums-help: e.g., social, email, cpc - identifies the marketing medium
utm-defaults-editor.terms-help: e.g., promo, sale, launch - identifies paid keywords
utm-defaults-editor.contents-help: e.g., header-cta, footer-link - differentiates similar content
utm-defaults-editor.defaults-hint: These defaults will be available when adding links to this campaign

upcoming-invoice.title: Next Invoice
upcoming-invoice.ending-description: Your subscription will end on {date}. No charge will be made.
upcoming-invoice.downgrade-description: Your plan will change to {plan} on {date}.
upcoming-invoice.downgrade-charge-note: You'll be charged the new plan rate on your next billing cycle.
upcoming-invoice.trial-note: You won't be charged until your trial ends.
upcoming-invoice.auto-charge-note: Your payment method will be charged automatically.
upcoming-invoice.polar-note: We partner with <link>Polar.sh</link> for secure payment processing and tax compliance. All invoices are issued by Polar and can be downloaded from the billing portal, where you can also update your billing information and payment method.

subscription-success.confirmed-subtitle: Welcome to {plan}! Your subscription is now active.
subscription-success.next-description: Your subscription is now active and all features are available immediately. You'll be billed {price} every month. You can manage your subscription or cancel at any time from your dashboard.
subscription-success.payment-failed-subtitle: We couldn't process your payment. Please update your payment method and try again.
subscription-success.payment-failed-description: Your card was declined or there was an issue processing the payment. This could be due to insufficient funds, an expired card, or your bank declining the transaction.
subscription-success.updated-subtitle: Your subscription has been upgraded successfully.
subscription-success.downgrade-scheduled-subtitle: Your subscription will be downgraded at the end of the billing period.
subscription-success.upgrade-next-description: You'll receive an invoice for the prorated amount based on your remaining billing period. The charge will appear on your next statement, and your new features are now available immediately.
subscription-success.downgrade-next-description: Your downgrade has been scheduled to take effect on {date}. Until then, you'll continue to have access to all your current features. A prorated credit will automatically be applied to your account when the change takes effect.

subscription-canceled.title: Cancellation Scheduled
subscription-canceled.subtitle: Your subscription has been set to cancel at the end of your billing period.
subscription-canceled.step-1: You'll continue to have full access to all features until {date}
subscription-canceled.step-2: On {date}, your subscription will automatically end and you'll be downgraded to the free plan
subscription-canceled.step-3: You won't be charged for any future billing periods
subscription-canceled.step-4: Your data will be retained according to our data retention policy
subscription-canceled.changed-mind-description: You can reactivate your subscription at any time before {date}. Simply visit your subscription settings and choose a plan.
subscription-canceled.feedback-note: We appreciate your feedback. If you have any questions or concerns, please <link>contact our support team</link>.

downgrade-form.title: Are you sure?
downgrade-form.subtitle: We are sorry to see you go. If you decide to downgrade, you will lose access to all the features of the current plan.
downgrade-form.confirm-description: You're about to downgrade to the {plan} plan. Your subscription will be prorated and the downgrade will take effect at the end of your current billing period. You'll receive a credit for the unused time.
downgrade-form.note: Your downgrade will be scheduled for the end of your current billing period.
downgrade-form.error-default: Failed to update subscription. Please try again.
downgrade-form.error-unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support.

delete-campaign.toast-error: There was a problem deleting your campaign

add-campaign-dialog.title: Create New Campaign
add-campaign-dialog.description: Create a campaign to group your links and track aggregated analytics.
add-campaign-dialog.error-duplicate: A campaign with this name already exists
add-campaign-dialog.error-plan-restricted: Campaigns are only available for Pro users

loading.settings-subtitle: Update your photo and personal details here.
loading.settings-plan-subtitle: Consult your plan's usage report and features.
loading.settings-security-access-subtitle: You're viewing recent activity on your account.
loading.qr-code-preview-note: This code is preview only, so don't copy it just yet. Your code will be generated once you finish creating it.

help-getting-started.title: Getting Started with Shortn
help-getting-started.subtitle: Everything you need to know to start shortening links and tracking engagement
help-getting-started.welcome-text: Shortn is your all-in-one link management platform. Whether you're a marketer, creator, or business owner, we help you create short links, track engagement, and understand your audience better.
help-getting-started.first-link-step1: From your dashboard, paste any URL into the quick create box
help-getting-started.first-link-step2: Click "Shorten" to generate your short link instantly
help-getting-started.first-link-step3: Copy and share your new shortn.at link anywhere
help-getting-started.first-link-outro: That's it! Your link is now live and ready to track clicks. Want more control? Click on the link to access advanced options like custom back-halves, tags, and password protection.
help-getting-started.plans-intro: Shortn offers four plans to fit your needs:
help-getting-started.plan-free-text: Perfect for trying out Shortn. Create up to 3 links and 3 QR codes per month.
help-getting-started.plan-basic-text: 25 links and QR codes monthly with basic click tracking.
help-getting-started.plan-plus-text: 50 links monthly with time-based analytics and location data.
help-getting-started.plan-pro-text: Unlimited links, full analytics, custom domains, bio pages, campaigns, and more.
help-getting-started.nav-intro: Your dashboard is organized into key sections:
help-getting-started.nav-home: Home: Quick link creation and recent activity overview
help-getting-started.nav-links: Links: Manage all your shortened links in one place
help-getting-started.nav-qr: QR Codes: Create and customize QR codes for your links
help-getting-started.nav-campaigns: Campaigns: Organize links by marketing campaigns (Pro only)
help-getting-started.next-intro: Now that you're familiar with the basics, explore these guides:

help-creating-links.title: Creating Short Links
help-creating-links.subtitle: Learn how to create and customize your short links
help-creating-links.quick-create-intro: The fastest way to shorten a link is through the Quick Create widget on your dashboard home:
help-creating-links.quick-create-step1: Paste any valid URL into the destination field
help-creating-links.quick-create-step3: Your short link is created instantly
help-creating-links.quick-create-outro: The system automatically generates a random 6-character code for your link. You'll be redirected to the link details page where you can customize it further.
help-creating-links.advanced-intro: For more control, use the full link creation page:
help-creating-links.advanced-step3: Add an optional title (helps you identify the link later)
help-creating-links.advanced-step4: Choose tags to organize your links
help-creating-links.backhalf-intro: Pro users can create branded, memorable links with custom back-halves:
help-creating-links.backhalf-rules: Custom back-halves must be unique and can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens.
help-creating-links.titles-text1: Add descriptive titles to your links for better organization. If you don't provide a title, Shortn will automatically fetch the title from the destination page.
help-creating-links.titles-text2: Titles are only visible to you in your dashboard and help you quickly identify links in lists and reports.
help-creating-links.tags-intro: Tags help you organize and filter your links. You can:
help-creating-links.tags-item1: Add multiple tags to a single link
help-creating-links.tags-item2: Create tags on-the-fly while creating links
help-creating-links.tags-item3: Filter your links by tags in the links dashboard
help-creating-links.tags-item4: Manage all tags from the tags section
help-creating-links.password-intro: Pro users can protect links with passwords. This is useful for:
help-creating-links.password-feature1: Visitors are shown a password entry page
help-creating-links.password-feature2: Optional hint text can help authorized users
help-creating-links.password-feature3: Rate limiting prevents brute force attempts
help-creating-links.password-feature4: Passwords are securely hashed and never stored in plain text
help-creating-links.best-item1: Use descriptive titles for better organization
help-creating-links.best-item3: Keep custom back-halves short and memorable
help-creating-links.best-item5: Review your monthly link quota in your plan

help-managing-links.title: Managing Your Links
help-managing-links.subtitle: Learn how to organize, edit, and maintain your link collection
help-managing-links.dashboard-text: Your links dashboard provides a comprehensive view of all your shortened links:
help-managing-links.dashboard-item1: View all links in a card or list format
help-managing-links.dashboard-item2: Sort by date created, clicks, or name
help-managing-links.dashboard-item3: Filter by tags, status, or search terms
help-managing-links.dashboard-item4: Quick actions for copy, edit, and delete
help-managing-links.editing-intro: Click on any link card to access editing options:
help-managing-links.editing-item1: Destination URL: Update where the link redirects
help-managing-links.editing-note: Changes to your links take effect immediately. The short link URL remains the same.
help-managing-links.details-intro: The link details page shows comprehensive information:
help-managing-links.filtering-intro: Find links quickly with powerful filtering:
help-managing-links.filtering-item1: Search: Find links by title, URL, or tag
help-managing-links.filtering-item2: Tags: Filter by one or multiple tags
help-managing-links.filtering-item3: Date Range: View links created within a period
help-managing-links.filtering-item4: Status: Show active, expired, or all links
help-managing-links.bulk-intro: Pro users can perform bulk actions:
help-managing-links.bulk-item1: Select multiple links for batch operations
help-managing-links.deleting-text: To delete a link, click the delete button on the link card or from the link details page. Deleted links are permanently removed and the short URL will no longer work.
help-managing-links.deleting-warning: Warning: Link deletion cannot be undone. Make sure you no longer need the link before deleting.

help-utm-parameters.title: UTM Parameters
help-utm-parameters.subtitle: Track your marketing campaigns with UTM parameters
help-utm-parameters.what-text: UTM (Urchin Tracking Module) parameters are tags added to URLs that help you track the effectiveness of your marketing campaigns. They work with analytics tools like Google Analytics to show you where your traffic is coming from.
help-utm-parameters.source-text: Identifies where the traffic is coming from.
help-utm-parameters.term-text: Identifies paid keywords in search campaigns.
help-utm-parameters.content-text: Differentiates similar content or links within the same ad.
help-utm-parameters.adding-intro: You can add UTM parameters when creating or editing a link:
help-utm-parameters.adding-step1: Open the link creation form or edit an existing link
help-utm-parameters.adding-step2: Scroll to the UTM Parameters section
help-utm-parameters.adding-step4: The parameters are automatically appended to your destination URL
help-utm-parameters.tip-text: Shortn stores your UTM parameters separately from the destination URL, so you can easily update them without changing the original link.
help-utm-parameters.best-item1: Use lowercase for all UTM values for consistency
help-utm-parameters.best-item2: Use underscores or hyphens instead of spaces
help-utm-parameters.best-item3: Keep parameter values short but descriptive
help-utm-parameters.best-item4: Document your naming conventions for your team
help-utm-parameters.best-item5: Be consistent with your parameter values across campaigns
help-utm-parameters.campaigns-text: Pro users can set default UTM parameters at the campaign level. When you add links to a campaign, these defaults are automatically applied, ensuring consistent tracking across all your campaign links.

help-analytics.title: Understanding Your Analytics
help-analytics.subtitle: Make sense of your link performance data
help-analytics.overview-text: Shortn provides detailed analytics to help you understand how your links perform. The depth of analytics available depends on your plan.
help-analytics.pro-text: Full analytics including referrers, devices, and detailed location data
help-analytics.link-intro: Click on any link to see its performance:
help-analytics.link-item2: Click Trend: How clicks change over time
help-analytics.link-item3: Geographic Data: Where your clicks come from
help-analytics.link-item4: Time Analysis: When people click your links
help-analytics.geo-intro: Available on Plus and Pro plans:
help-analytics.time-intro: Understand when your audience is most active:
help-analytics.time-item3: Historical trends over weeks and months
help-analytics.campaign-text: Pro users can view aggregated analytics across all links in a campaign, including total clicks, top performing links, and UTM parameter breakdowns.
help-analytics.export-text: Pro users can export analytics data for further analysis:
help-analytics.tips-item1: Check analytics regularly to understand what's working
help-analytics.tips-item3: Use time data to optimize when you share links
help-analytics.tips-item4: Geographic data helps target your audience better

help-creating-qr.title: Creating QR Codes
help-creating-qr.subtitle: Generate scannable QR codes for your links
help-creating-qr.what-text: QR (Quick Response) codes are scannable barcodes that can link to any URL. They're perfect for print materials, products, and physical locations where typing a URL isn't convenient.
help-creating-qr.create-intro: To create a new QR code:
help-creating-qr.create-step1: Navigate to QR Codes → Create New
help-creating-qr.customize-intro: Make your QR codes match your brand:
help-creating-qr.customize-logo: Logo: Add your logo to the center (Pro only)
help-creating-qr.download-text: Download your QR codes in multiple formats:
help-creating-qr.download-png: PNG: Best for digital use and web
help-creating-qr.best-item1: Test your QR code before printing
help-creating-qr.best-item3: Don't make QR codes too small (minimum 2cm x 2cm)
help-creating-qr.best-item4: Add a call-to-action near the QR code
help-creating-qr.best-item5: Use SVG format for large print materials
help-creating-qr.linking-text: QR codes created in Shortn automatically use your short links. This means you get all the tracking benefits and can even change the destination without reprinting the QR code.

help-managing-qr.title: Managing QR Codes
help-managing-qr.subtitle: Organize and update your QR code collection
help-managing-qr.dashboard-text: Your QR codes dashboard shows all your generated codes with preview images, titles, and click statistics.
help-managing-qr.editing-intro: You can update QR codes after creation:
help-managing-qr.editing-item1: Destination: Change where the QR code links to
help-managing-qr.editing-note: The QR code image remains scannable even after changes.
help-managing-qr.analytics-text: QR codes share analytics with their linked short URLs, so you can track scans just like link clicks.
help-managing-qr.tips-item1: Always test printed QR codes with multiple devices
help-managing-qr.tips-item2: Consider the surface material and finish
help-managing-qr.tips-item3: Leave a quiet zone (white space) around the code
help-managing-qr.tips-item4: Account for scanning distance when sizing

help-creating-bio.title: Creating Bio Pages
help-creating-bio.subtitle: Build custom link-in-bio pages for your profiles
help-creating-bio.what-text: Bio pages are customizable landing pages that showcase multiple links in one place. Perfect for social media profiles where you can only share one link.
help-creating-bio.available: Bio pages are available on Pro plans only.
help-creating-bio.create-step2: Choose a unique URL slug (e.g., shortn.at/@yourname)
help-creating-bio.elements-intro: Add various content types to your bio page:
help-creating-bio.elements-item1: Links: Buttons that link to any URL
help-creating-bio.analytics-text: Track views and clicks on your bio page and individual links. See which links perform best and when your page gets the most traffic.
help-creating-bio.tips-item1: Keep it focused - don't add too many links
help-creating-bio.tips-item2: Put your most important link first
help-creating-bio.tips-item4: Update regularly to keep content fresh
help-creating-bio.tips-item5: Match your bio page style to your brand

help-customizing-bio.title: Customizing Bio Pages
help-customizing-bio.subtitle: Design bio pages that match your brand
help-customizing-bio.themes-text: Start with a preset theme and customize from there:
help-customizing-bio.colors-item4: Accents: Highlight colors for links and icons
help-customizing-bio.branding-item1: Upload a profile picture or logo
help-customizing-bio.branding-item3: Include your brand name and tagline
help-customizing-bio.preview-text: Always preview your page on multiple devices before publishing. Use the preview feature to see how your page looks on mobile and desktop.

help-campaigns.title: Organizing Campaigns
help-campaigns.subtitle: Group and track related links together
help-campaigns.what-text: Campaigns allow you to group related links together for better organization and consolidated analytics. Perfect for marketing initiatives, product launches, or any project with multiple links.
help-campaigns.available: Campaigns are available on Pro plans only.
help-campaigns.create-step2: Enter a campaign name and description
help-campaigns.adding-intro: You can add links to campaigns in several ways:
help-campaigns.adding-item1: Create new links directly within a campaign
help-campaigns.adding-item2: Add existing links from your link library
help-campaigns.utm-text: Set default UTM parameters at the campaign level. These are automatically applied to all new links in the campaign, ensuring consistent tracking.
help-campaigns.analytics-intro: View aggregated performance across all campaign links:
help-campaigns.managing-item4: Set campaign goals and track progress
help-campaigns.tips-item1: Use descriptive names that include dates or goals
help-campaigns.tips-item2: Set up UTM defaults before adding links
help-campaigns.tips-item4: Archive old campaigns to keep your workspace clean

help-plans.title: Plans & Pricing
help-plans.subtitle: Choose the right plan for your needs
help-plans.overview-text: Shortn offers four plans designed for different usage levels:
help-plans.compare-text: See detailed feature comparison on our pricing page.
help-plans.changing-text: You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account settings. Upgrades take effect immediately with prorated billing. Downgrades take effect at the end of your billing period.

qr-code-details-card.delete-error: There was a problem deleting your QR Code.
qr-code-details-card.create-link-dialog-title: Create a link for your Code
qr-code-details-card.create-link-dialog-description: Creating a link for this QR Code will use up one of your monthly links.
qr-code-details-card.title: Title
qr-code-details-card.error-custom-restricted: Custom back-halves are restricted to pro accounts.
qr-code-details-card.error-plan-limit: You have reached your plan's link limit.
qr-code-details-card.error-default: There was a problem creating your link.
qr-code-details-card.download-ready: Your download is ready and should start now.
qr-code-details-card.download-error: There was an error creating your download.

help-upgrading.title: Upgrading Your Plan
help-upgrading.subtitle: Get more features with a plan upgrade
help-upgrading.upgrade-step2: Click on the plan you want to upgrade to
help-upgrading.billing-item1: We accept all major credit cards
help-upgrading.billing-item2: Billing is monthly, charged on your signup date
help-upgrading.billing-item3: Upgrades are prorated - you only pay the difference
help-upgrading.billing-item4: Receipts are sent to your account email
help-upgrading.immediate-text: Upgrades take effect immediately. You'll have instant access to all new features, increased limits, and enhanced analytics.
help-upgrading.downgrade-text: If you need to downgrade, you can do so from your subscription settings. Downgrades take effect at the end of your current billing period. You'll keep access to all features until then.
help-upgrading.cancel-text: You can cancel your subscription at any time. After cancellation, you'll retain access until the end of your billing period, then revert to the free plan.
help-upgrading.next-text: If you have questions about billing or plans, contact our support team at support@shortn.at.
